participant_1.background:
I enjoy the creative process of designing and sewing my own clothes.
i own a home with 5 acres of land.
I can be a little distant with my family, but they're understanding about my lifestyle choices.
My recipe box is a collection of memories from my family.
I always end my day with a cup of chai tea to wind down from the chaos of family life.

participant_2.background:
I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.
i can benchpress 345 pounds.
I bought my first guitar when I was 14 years old.
I've been lucky enough to avoid any physical altercations in my lifetime.
I'm not rich, but I love technology and I have a sweet tooth.

content.text: Hey! I'm a bit distant with my family too but it's all good. How do you stay away from cigarettes?
I've just been lucky enough to avoid any physical altercations. I'm trying to quit smoking, but it's hard.
My family is understanding about my lifestyle choices. What's your favorite technology?
I'm not rich, but I love technology. I have a sweet tooth, but I'm trying to work out more.
I design and sew my own clothes. I always end my day with a cup of chai tea.
That's awesome! I bought my first guitar when I was 14. I love playing music.
I love music too. I'm trying to get my family more involved in my creative process.
That's awesome! I'm always looking for new ways to stay active.
